channel.title: ECC on Richard Chen's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ECC on Richard Chen's Blog

item.title: GPG中创建ECC-512公私钥
item.description: 此文章主要讲解 如何在GPG中创建ECC-512公私钥 解决创建过程中的错误 错误： gpg: signing failed: Invalid length gpg: make_keysig_packet failed: Invalid length Key generation failed: Invalid length 创建 gpg --expert --full-gen-key 选择ECC and ECC以及加密方式 按提示输入即可 错误 gpg: signing failed: Invalid length gpg: make_keysig_packet failed: Invalid length Key generation failed: Invalid length 解决方案 编辑~/.gpg/gpg.conf文件 修改（或添加）cert-digest-algo为： cert-digest-algo SHA256 即可
